column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Huge huge huge tapas fan and was not disappointed by Cafe Babareeba. Went here for a work dinner with bunch 10 other people. The staples like the wrapped dates and the meatballs were on point
column2: but the hangar steak and the goat cheese tomato garlic bread REALLY stole the show. Ordered the paella as well
column3: but I was not a fan.
